      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy(boolean internal)
        Description copied from interface: RecordStoreMutationObserver
        Called when the observed RecordStore is being destroyed. The observer should release all resources. The implementations of this method should be idempotent.
        Specified by:
        onDestroy in interface RecordStoreMutationObserver
        Parameters:
        internal - is only data bound to the MapService being destroyed
